entry.title: Mike and Ike Sour Lemon - 24ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Just Born
Type: Candy
Price: 11.99

 Sour Citrusy Mike and Ike's for On-The-Go

    So you forgot your lemon ginger shot at home and now you're looking for some way to get your tangy, citrus fix? Try this sweet and sour alternative, Mike and Ike's Sour Lemon! Each pack contains a burst of fruity Lemon flavoured Mike and Ike's that'll leave your tastebuds stunned. 
    This box comes with 24 mini-packs that are perfect to take with you wherever you go. Whether you down the pack in one gulp, or share with your friends, we'll support you any way you want to enjoy your candy. 

Perfect for keeping your favourite treat in stock, for lunch boxes, or on-the-go snacks!

  • Made in the USA
  • Kosher Certified Parve
  • Gluten-Free
  • Fat-Free
  • Made with Real Fruit Juice

528g | 24 packs in one box

Chewy and Tropical!

The Mike And Ike Tropical Typhoon Snack Bag will leave your mind blown! Filled with intense FRUCHEWY® flavored candies, your taste buds are in for a wild ride. No need for a vacation in the tropics when you can get this sweet candy!

Vendor: Just Born

 Citrusy Mike & Ike's for On-The-Go

    Orange Crush is your favourite flavour? Check. Used to chug Sunny-D like it was no one's business? Check. Terry's Chocolate on your stocking stuffer wishlist every year for Santa to bring? Check! Even if you aren't an orange maniac, these delightfully sweet chewy candies are perfect no matter the flavour! 
    This box comes with 24 mini-packs that are perfect to take with you wherever you go. Whether you down the pack in one gulp, or share with your friends, we'll support you any way you want to enjoy your candy.

entry.title: Mike and Ike Berry Blast - 24 pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Just Born
Type: Candy
Price: 11.99

Mike and Ike Berry Blast

Bursting with the delicious taste of berries, these candies are beyond satisfying! These chewy candies come in five berry flavours, Wild Berry, Blue Raspberry, Strawberry, Blueberry, and Peach Berry. Made with the goodness of real fruit juice Mike And Ike Berry Blast are chewy, luscious and so very flavourful!
  • Made in the USA
  • Made with Real Fruit Juice
  • Kosher Certified Parve
  • Gluten-Free
  • Fat-Free

24x22g packs

Ingredients:
Sugar, corn syrup, modified food starch, fruit juice from concentrate (pear, orange, strawberry, cherry, lime, lemon), contains less than 2% of the following: citric acid, malic acid, fumaric acid, sodium citrate, natural and artificial flavors, dextrin, confectioner's glaze, carnauba wax, medium-chain triglycerides, red 40, blue 1, yellow 5 (tartrazine).
Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

Vendor: Just Born

Just like the Fluffy Confection!

Theatre Pack

Bring the taste of the carnival right into your living room! The Mike and Ike Cotton Candy Theatre Pack is a new twist on an old time favorite. There's nothing quite like settling into a movie with a big box of candy in hand. So why not grab a box of Cotton Candy Mike & Ikes?
